name: Pork Tenderloin with Gratinated Potatoes
ingredients: 500 g gratinated potatoes with cheese on top
instructions: Mix mustard, crushed garlic, salt, and pepper to create the marinade.
Smear the pork tenderloin with the marinade.
Sear the meat on high heat in a pan with melted butter until browned.
Transfer pork to a baking dish and cook in the oven using a thermometer until internal temperature reaches 53Â°C.
Serve pork with gratinated potatoes on the side.
